title: Strong Mac,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: Had not Tib Lonnen, that tearing beauty of the Directory  days, ended by throwing over all the bucks of the time and marrying old Kissock of Birkenshaw, over fifty, snuffy and badger-grey ? Did not Effie Hill sit in Girderwood  pew in Lowran kirk, having migrated from that of Hunter ston just across the aisle?
